body_html:
@maxfiedler could you please let us know the exception stack trace? It will be useful to know which session.run command created this error.

BTW, MonitoredTrainingSession has an argument save_summaries_steps. you can use that instead to handle summaries.
body_text:
@maxfiedler could you please let us know the exception stack trace? It will be useful to know which session.run command created this error.
BTW, MonitoredTrainingSession has an argument  save_summaries_steps. you can use that instead to handle summaries.
body:
@maxfiedler could you please let us know the exception stack trace? It will be useful to know which session.run command created this error.

BTW, `MonitoredTrainingSession` has an argument ` save_summaries_steps`. you can use that instead to handle summaries.
